thread.title: Puri Jagannadh to work with Raj Tharun
thread.title_full: Puri Jagannadh to work with Raj Tharun

author: Deccan
title: Puri Jagannadh to work with Raj Tharun
text:
Deccan Chronicle | Suresh Kavirayani | October 06, 2015, 22.54 pm Puri Jagannadh Puri Jagannadh will be working with Raj Tharun soon. Interestingly, he will not be directing the young actor. “The director is busy with his upcoming projects, so he is only providing the story and dialogues,” says a source close to the director.
Currently, Puri is discussing the story with Raj in Bangkok. The source adds that former actress Revathi will be directing the film.
“Actually, her name was suggested by Puri’s guru Ram Gopal Varma, and Puri immediately asked her to do it,” adds the source.
Meanwhile, Raj Tharun’s Kumari F21 is set to release soon.
